name: Thunder Plays
description:
A little (not)game about the time I met ghosts in the storm and played with them.

WASD (or ZQSD) + Mouse to wander.

UP/DOWN Arrow Keys to play Pong.

E to turn on/off screens.

Escape to quit the game.

Made in 48h for the Ludum Dare 31 : "Entire Game on One Screen".

Vote here : http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-31/?action=p...
